title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: When searching for references to the field in an external jar, the search results are not being selected. Build 200201151.
OB: When searching for references to the field in the external jar, the search results are not being selected.
EB: When searching for references to the field in the external jar, you should get 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have the source for rt.jar). 
2. Open the java.io.File class. 
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'. 
4. Perform the search.
